metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7911 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Race condition in the get_task_ioprio function in block/ioprio.c in theLinux kernel before 4.6.6 allows local users to gain privileges or cause adenial of service (use-after-free) via a crafted ioprio_get system call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7911` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-109-generic - 3.13.0-109.156
linux-image-3.13.0-109-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-109.156
linux-image-3.13.0-109-lowlatency - 3.13.0-109.156
linux-image-3.13.0-109-powerpc-e500 - 3.13.0-109.156
linux-image-3.13.0-109-powerpc-e500mc - 3.13.0-109.156
linux-image-3.13.0-109-powerpc-smp - 3.13.0-109.156
linux-image-3.13.0-109-powerpc64-emb - 3.13.0-109.156
linux-image-3.13.0-109-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-109.156
linux-image-extra-3.13.0-109-generic - 3.13.0-109.156
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-38-generic - 4.4.0-38.57~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-38-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-38.57~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-38-lowlatency - 4.4.0-38.57~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-38-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-38.57~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-38-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-38.57~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-38-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-38.57~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-38-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-38.57~14.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-38-generic - 4.4.0-38.57~14.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1002-aws - 4.4.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.13.0-109.156').
linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.

linux-lts-vivid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was pending').
linux-lts-wily: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-38.57~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1002.2').
linux-azure package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1').
